welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Karuhatan, Philippines! Get ready to experience the charm of our city known for its lively markets and delicious local cuisine. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and enjoying all that Karuhatan has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as the Centennial Terminal, it is dedicated to Philippine Airlines and its partner airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at the airport, serving mostly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Formerly known as the Domestic Terminal, it serves mostly domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi for up to 2 hours within the airport premises.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
